title: Chapter 233: Enjoying It Together Instead Of Enjoying It Alone
body:
Chapter 233: Enjoying It Together Instead Of Enjoying It Alone

Chapter 233 – Enjoying It Together Instead Of Enjoying It Alone


Posted at 10:05 am by blazaria, on June 27, 2017


Ning Xi’s series of movement was perfect, as smooth as the flowing water, it was just like she did this kind of things frequently……


At the end, she maintained the posture of her foot stepping on the man’s back, an elbow on her knee, while her fairy-like face previous has already become that of a hooligan, full of confidence and arrogance, “Hand me your phone!”


The scumbag was beaten until he felt dizzy and disoriented, and without any strength to fight back, he could only ask for mercy, “My phone is in my pocket, my wallet is there too, there is also a ring in my bag, I’ll give them all to you! Please spare me, heroine!”


He never imagined, that picking up girls will result in robbery! And this robber is a big beauty! Also, with that fighting skills and the scary killing aura, one look and you can tell that she is a professional ah!


Ning Xi did not care that this scumbag misunderstood, she took out his phone, then handed it to him, “Give me your hand, help big uncle unlock it!”


“Un……unlock? What do you want to do?” The scumbag warily asked.


Ning Xi slapped him when she heard his slightest disagreement, “Stop your nonsense and just unlock it! Do you believe that I’ll disable that three-inch plaything below?”


“I’ll unlock it! I’ll Immediately unlock it!” The scumbag got so scared his face turned white, and he quickly helped her unlock the phone.


Ning Xi looked through his contacts and found his wife’s number, then dialed a video call.


Soon, the phone got connected.


Inside the phone, the face of a woman appeared, she could tell that the woman has a good upbringing, but probably because of long-term house work and the lack of knowledge to maintain her health, she looked haggard and sallow. It is the image of a wife who is detested by her scumbag husband.


“Who……who are you?” The woman’s face changed colour when she saw Ning Xi’s dazzling face, then tiredly said, “I do not care who you are, he can be with whoever he likes to be with, I am already preparing to divorce him, and I do not want a penny, so in the future, he has nothing to do with me! Do not look for me anymore!”


Ning Xi had a look of regret that she did not met her expectation and shook her head, “Tsk, how can you spare him this easily? This sister, you are really too kind!”


The woman did not expect that Ning Xi did not play by the rules, and could not helped but be stumped, her face vigilant, “What……what do you mean?”


Ning Xi curved her lips, and switched the phone’s camera towards the scumbag that has been beaten black and blue by her until his face become swollen, “See?”


After having a clear look of the man inside the phone, the woman was completely stunned, “You……you two……this is?”


Ning Xi chuckled, “How is it? Do you feel good?”


After a long time, the woman snapped out of it, even though she did not understand what is happening, but seeing the man who was beaten, she subconsciously replied, “En!”


After speaking, there was a trace of bitterness in her face.


Once upon a time, when he had a small cut, she would be very worried and tense, but seeing his pathetic state today, she only felt joy……


“Oh, that’s good! The reason I made this call was for no other reason. I thought that rather than enjoying this alone, I should share the joy, so I called for you to see, that way everyone can enjoy it!” Ning Xi said in a lazy and casual tone.


“……” The woman still had a dumbfounded look, as she did not know how to respond to this strange situation.


As for the scumbag below Ning Xi’s foot, that pig-head face is currently very twisted. He could have never imagined that this woman not only humiliated him physically, but mentally as well, allowing his wife, who had always adored him, to see this dull and embarrassed side of him.
